title: Exploring Gender and Social Structures in Educational Institutions: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of sociology at the secondary education level and awareness of gender issues
context.additional_context: Learners analyze gender inequality issues within educational institutions and participate in designing alternative structures, using collaboration tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three cases of gender inequality within educational institutions and explain them in a social context
Learners can write a proposal for improving educational policies by applying feminist theories (radical feminism/intersectionality)
Learners can develop a gender sensitivity education program prototype through PBL team activities and respond to presentation evaluations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
